presets.description: Fast vocal separation using a registered model ID.

presets.name: Best Quality Vocals
presets.description: Uses Unwa Big Beta 6X for state-of-the-art vocal separation.

presets.name: Cleanest Vocals (Minimal Bleed)
presets.description: Uses Unwa Kim FT2 Bleedless for maximum vocal cleanliness.

presets.name: Piano Separation
presets.description: Uses SCNet Large for optimal piano extraction.

presets.name: Drums Separation
presets.description: Uses Mel-Roformer DrumSep for detailed drum kit separation.

presets.name: De-Reverb
presets.description: Removes reverb using best-in-class Mel-Roformer De-reverb by anvuew v2.

presets.name: Crowd/SFX Removal
presets.description: Removes crowd noise and sound effects from audio.

presets.name: Guitar/Piano Separation
presets.description: Uses BS-Roformer SW 6-stem for high-quality guitar and piano extraction.

presets.name: Vocals Bleedless
presets.description: Minimal instrumental bleed. Cleanest possible isolation.

presets.name: Vocals Fullness
presets.description: Maximum vocal richness and frequency preservation.

phase_swap.description: Uses clean Bleedless reference for noise reduction

presets.name: Instrumental Fullness
presets.description: Maximum frequency richness. Sounds closest to original mix minus vocals.

phase_swap.description: Golden Pair: Becruily Vocal reference removes V1e noise while preserving fullness

ensembles.name: Vocal Ultimate
ensembles.description: Big Beta 6X provides detail, voc_fv4 provides cleanliness. Best for RVC.

ensembles.name: Instrumental Ultimate
ensembles.description: V1e provides fullness, Becruily Inst retrieves instruments V1e misses.

ensembles.name: Max Detail Recovery
ensembles.description: V1e + Resurrection Inst combination - top tier for recovering details.

ensembles.name: Ultimate Bleedless
ensembles.description: Combines top bleedless models using min_spec for maximum cleanliness.

ensembles.name: Ultimate Fullness
ensembles.description: Combines full-bodied models using max_spec for maximum frequency retention.
